channel.title: Fireside Winery on The Compass Rose Band
channel.description: Recent content in Fireside Winery on The Compass Rose Band

item.title: Fireside Winery
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band as we return to the beautiful and intimate setting of the Fireside Winery in Marengo, Iowa. Choose one or more of the many great varieties of Fireside wines and settle in next to one of the fire pits next to the outdoor stage for an evening of great music under the stars!

item.title: Private Party
item.description: This event is closed to the public. It is an appreciation party for the employees of the Marengo Memorial Hospital.
